item.title: Adventofcode 2020 - Day 20
item.description: day 20 https://adventofcode.com/2020/day/20 The task is to assemble an image from different 10x10 tiles. The tiles themselves can be flipped and rotated. transformations I didn’t want to calculate the image transformations myself, so I used java’s java.awt.geom.AffineTransform.
